alert.note: Alert for Butler; Franklin (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 04 at 6:19PM CDT until April 04 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 PM CDT FOR NORTHERN HARDIN...SOUTHEASTERN FRANKLIN...NORTHWESTERN GRUNDY... SOUTHWESTERN BUTLER AND NORTHEASTERN HAMILTON COUNTIES... At 618 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Iowa Falls, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Locations impacted include... Ackley, Bradford, Ackley Municipal Airport and Geneva. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for central Iowa. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
